mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_customer SET pw=#{pw1} WHERE id=#{id} AND pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name FROM tbl_customer WHERE id=#{id} AND pw=#{pw}

SELECT id FROM tbl_customer WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_customer(id, pw, name, birth, age, sex, email, phone, address) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, #{birth})/12), #{sex}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address})
